mapper.select: SELECT member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, report_state AS reportState, report_date AS reportDate FROM mini_market_report_c_by_m WHERE report_state = "신고확인" ORDER BY report_no DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mini_market_report_m_by_c WHERE report_state LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reportState},'%')

SELECT r.report_no AS reportNo, r.report_title AS reportTitle, r.report_content AS reportContent, r.company_id AS companyId, r.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, m.member_id AS memberId, r.report_state AS reportState, r.report_date AS reportDate FROM mini_market_report_c_by_m r INNER JOIN mini_market_member m ON r.member_unique_no = m.member_unique_no WHERE r.report_state LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reportState},'%') ORDER BY r.report_state ASC, r.report_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT r.report_no AS reportNo, r.report_title AS reportTitle, r.report_content AS reportContent, r.company_id AS companyId, r.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, m.member_id AS memberId, r.report_state AS reportState, r.report_date AS reportDate FROM mini_market_report_c_by_m r INNER JOIN mini_market_member m ON r.member_unique_no = m.member_unique_no WHERE r.report_no = #{reportNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_report_c_by_m( report_title, report_content, company_id, member_unique_no, report_date ) VALUES ( #{reportTitle}, #{reportContent}, #{companyId}, #{memberUniqueNo}, now() )
